name: Number of subgroups of S_n isomorphic to S_5, where S_n is the n-th symmetric group.
program: return Sum(IsomorphicSubgroups(S, SymmetricGroup(5)), x->Index(S, Normalizer(S, Image(x))));
author: _Jianing Song_, Nov 21 2024

name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of subgroups of S_n isomorphic to S_k, where S_n is the n-th symmetric group.
comment: The number of monomorphisms (i.e., injective homomorphisms) S_k -> S_n is thus |Aut(S_k)|*T(n,k). Note that |Aut(S_k)| = 1 for k = 2, 1440 for k = 6 and k! otherwise.
T(n,k) is related to the number of homomorphisms S_k -> S_n:
k     | trivial kernel | kernel S_k (k>=2) | kernel A_k (k>=3) | kernel V (k=4) |       total number
Here A_n is the n-th alternating group, V = {e, (1 2)(3 4), (1 3)(2 4), (1 4)(2 3)} is the Klein-four group in S_4, b = A000085, and T(n,k) = 0 for k > n.
In particular, the number of homomorphisms S_n -> S_n is 1 for n = 1, 2 for n = 2, 58 for n = 4, 1440 + b(6) = 1516 for n = 6, and n! + b(n) otherwise.
program: end; # program given in the Math Stack Exchange link
local L, C, G, N, k;
if not IsomorphismGroups( G, SymmetricGroup(k) ) = fail then
author: _Jianing Song_, Nov 18 2024

name: Number of subgroups of S_n isomorphic to S_3, where S_n is the n-th symmetric group.
formula: a(n) = (A281097(n) - A000085(n))/6. See A378163 for more information.
program: return Sum(IsomorphicSubgroups(S, SymmetricGroup(3)), x->Index(S, Normalizer(S, Image(x))));
author: _Jianing Song_, Nov 21 2024

name: Number of subgroups of S_n isomorphic to S_4, where S_n is the n-th symmetric group.
program: return Sum(IsomorphicSubgroups(S, SymmetricGroup(4)), x->Index(S, Normalizer(S, Image(x))));
author: _Jianing Song_, Nov 21 2024
